categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Chad Longko was a member of the Galactic Empire who trained as a cadet at the Imperial Academy of Carida, located on the planet Carida. Longko joined the academy during the year 5 BBY, and graduated during 1 BBY. The graduation ceremony for that year's cadets was overseen by General Rom Mohc, who called Longko's name, alongside several others, to step forward and receive a special award of valor and merit.

Chad Longko was first mentioned in the audio adaption of the novella Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire, which was released in 1997. As the character's name is only given in spoken dialogue from the audio adaption, the actual spelling of the character's name cannot be determined.
